author: Sarthak Dogra
title: 400 White Hackers Are Quietly Saving World From COVID19-Based Online Attacks
description: A group of white hackers from across the world have come together to fight the increasing number of cyber attacks online citing the Coronavirus outbreak. At a time when medical facilities cannot bear the burden of a cyber attack, these hackers will safeguard …
content:
With the Coronavirus outbreak skyrockets dependency on communication networks and health organisations for the world to operate, the same has become a hotbed for cyber attackers in recent months. 
To protect the networks from a potentially crippling attack, … [+2411 chars]
